description: The part of the Articulating Manipulator that causes the jaws or cutter to open and close.
A float designed specifically for the Rotating Manipulator to provide addition buoyancy to counter the weight of the manipulator.
A weight designed to help maintain an even pitch of the ROV when the Rotating Manipulator is installed on the ROV.
A universal name for the jaws or cutter.
The part of the Rotating Manipulator that causes the jaws or cutter to rotate.
